newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Clariant business up in first quarter.
newsitem.headline: Clariant business up in first quarter.

text.p: Swiss speciality chemicals group Clariant AG said business in the first quarter of 1997 had been good and all divisions had seen were an increase in business compared with the first quarter of 1996.
"The first quarter is good, we are ahead of last year in all divisions," Clariant chief executive Martin Syz told a news conference.
Syz also said the outlook for the next few months and the entire year was generally positive and he had heard no negative reaction with regard to the next few months from any divisions.
